name: quickstart-webpack
description: A scaffold project for a Webpack based webapplication, without the overhead of specific libraries.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run dist
scripts.clean: del-cli dist/bundle.js dist/bundle.js.map dist/*.bmp dist/*.png dist/*.svg dist/*.eot dist/*.ttf dist/*.woff dist/*.woff2 *.tgz
scripts.prepack: npm run clean && npm run dist
